mil3.3.13:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.3.13:0.3_0: Standing on the spots of marks.
mil3.3.13:1.1_0: “What is the thought of a dragon?”
mil3.3.13:2.2_0: “Great king, the wooden works with just go forth.
mil3.3.13:2.3_0: In the same way, great king, think the thought that’s already thought.”
